about_the_game:
You've been hired by the slightly shady Clookoo Transport company to travel the world cleaning up corruption that they may have caused. In return, you get your very own free* train station!

*Train station is only free if you work an unpaid job for the rest of your life.




  • Purchase seeds from the gift shop, plant them, and watch them grow!
  • Improve your farming skills and get rare variant crops!
  • Not a fan of watching crops grow? Click near your crops to help them grow quicker!
  • Discover all sorts of things to plant from ancient vegetables to golden fruit!




  • Feed gellis for different effects depending on the biome like creating spells and even giving you money!
  • Watch them interact with their environment and each other. Each gelli has its own personality!
  • Read about each gelli in their biomes gelli book!
  • Give a gelli its favorite food and you might get a gift!




    • Collect over 40 "critter" items like fish and bugs!
    • Interact with birds before they fly away to collect their feathers!
    • Give feathers, fish, and bugs to Mr.Collector and unlock hats for your gellis!
    • Enjoy fun minigames like juggling wooden logs, mining through a mountain, and more!




    • As you play your luck level increases, making rare events more likely to occur!
    • Each biome has a charm that gives incredible powers like planting three crops at once.
    • Complete challenges in biomes to unlock and build amenities that improve your skills across all biomes.




    • Travel to 7 distinct biomes all with their own playstyle and unique mechanics.
    • Visit a farm where everything gets covered in mud.
    • Explore an archeological dig site and restore the museum.
    • Help a pirate cat reclaim her lost treasure on a remote beach.

    Gelli Fields is a project that comes from the heart. Thank you so much for checking this out.

    • Help a pirate cat reclaim her lost treasure on a remote beach.

movies.name: Gelli Fields Farming Fest Demo Announcement Trailer

name: Gelli Fields

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: As corruption spreads throughout Continaa you fight back in the coziest way possible! Befriend magic slimes, farm, and upgrade your train station to improve your skills as you visit distinct biomes all with their own unique playstyle!
